reviews.text: It's a tiny Asian Bistro where through no fault of their own the parking garage door opens to the back of the store. The sign on the door advertised a...
We've been here twice and it is a gem! Clean, friendly staff, and yum food. The spicy kimchi chicken is my fav!
We had a great experience at Diaspora. We came in on a Wednesday night around 6 pm and we were seated immediately. It's a smaller place with a pretty chill...
